wordpressPost.title: I made a mixtape: MOUTHFEELS
wordpressPost.content:
Last night I went to a neat event where you swap mixtapes with people. I decided to make a mixtape called MOUTHFEELS (a term coined by my good bud Kevin). MOUTHFEELS is a collection of songs about food, eating, and other mouth feels.

Tracklist

  • I Like Food – Descendents
  • Salad Days – Mac DeMarco
  • Macho Nachos – Mad Caddies
  • Cocoa Butter Kisses – Chance the Rapper
  • Collard Greens – Schoolboy Q (feat. Kendrick Lamar)
  • The Food – Common (feat. Kanye West)
  • Chicken Chow Mein – Home Brew
  • Super Fast Jellyfish – Gorillaz (feat. Gruff Rys and De la Soul)
  • Jerk Chicken – Action Bronson (feat. Maffew Ragazino)
  • Flamingo – Kero Kero Bonito
  • Ton Plat Favori – Malajube
  • Pork N’ Beans – Left Lane Cruiser
  • Hot Guacamole – MF DOOM
  • Ham ‘n’ Eggs – A Tribe Called Quest
  • The Hunger – The Misfits
  • Soul Food – Jimi Hendrix

Check’er out on Youtube! Or holla if you want a copy.
